title: 6 shapeshifters
body: There is only 5 shapeshifters in tft and its not possible to make a champion shapeshifter with spatula but it requires 6 champions to get 120% health on shapeshifters boost.

replies.body: Nor is it possible to get 6 gunslingers.  It's not a bug, it's preparation.  They have prepared for new champions to enter the game without putting the champions in yet.
